page.title: 03 INDUSTRY 1
page.content: Athough there are many small industrial concerns by far the largest employer is{James W Cook & Co {(Wivenhoe) Ltd Shipbuilders & {Engineers. 82 people work here making small coasting vessels tugs and barges up to a 1000 tonnes.Ships have been built on this site for centuries,although the present yard is 50 years old.At present the whole work force is concentrating on the{Jubilee Sailing {Trust}three masted barque{Lord {Nelson.}The yard also makes ships furniture for other yards in the country. Other principal employers are the two dock firms,{Wivenhoe Port,}and a branch of the{Colchester Dock {Transit Co,}who have a quay on the {**************************************
